com.mpos.lottery.te.port.service

类 CommonFacadeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mpos.lottery.te.port.service.CommonFacadeService
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FacadeService

    public class CommonFacadeService
extends java.lang.Object
implements FacadeService
    The facade of all services. It means client should access service via this facade, due to some common pre-condition, post-condition will be checked here.

    It includes:

    1. Does the GPE exists?
    2. Does timestamp in request is between local_timestamp(+/-)10 minutes..middleman-attack
    3. Record transaction
    4. ......

      • facade

        public void facade(Context request,
          Context response)
            throws ApplicationException
        A facade method which will accept all incoming requests and route to apropriate service then.
        指定者:
        facade 在接口中 FacadeService
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • checkSettlement

        protected final void checkSettlement(Context<?> respCtx)
                              throws ApplicationException
        Check whether the operator has performed settlement today. If settlement has been done, no payout allowed that day.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • checkOperatorMerchant

        protected void checkOperatorMerchant(Context request,
                         Context response)
                              throws ApplicationException
        Check the preconditions of operator/merchant which must be met before route to service. check below condition: 1) Does the operator exists? 2) Is the operator active?
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
